data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Hyderabad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hyderabad, Telangana, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Hyderabad, Telangana, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Hyderabad, Telangana, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Hyderabad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Machala people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Hyderabad, Telangana, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Hyderabad who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Hyderabad who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Hyderabad
location.people_groups_list: Chambhar, Gawli, Velama Koppala, Mala Dasari, Madiga (Muslim traditions)
